name: LOUGH FOYLE Glamping Pods
detail: A luxury outdoor accommodation rental website designed for effortless online bookings, offering a seamless interface for users to find and reserve upscale rental pods.

name: Audit My IT
detail: an independent online platform, Audit My IT, designed to democratize and streamline IT auditing for businesses across the UK

name: Murphys Chemist
detail: Murphy's Chemist offers an online platform for health and pharmacy services, ensuring accessible and comprehensive care and medication management.

name: Security App Pro
detail: Security App Pro, a revolutionary application aimed at simplifying security management and access control for businesses in Ireland.

name: Cozy Gp
detail: Cozygo is an innovative house-hunting Frontend website designed to streamline the property search experience. It enables users to list properties, create and share wishlists, schedule viewings, and explore homes with ease, transforming the way users engage with the real estate market.

name: House Hunting API
detail: Cozygo is an innovative house-hunting API designed to streamline the property search experience. It enables users to list properties, create and share wishlists, schedule viewings, and explore homes with ease, transforming the way users engage with the real estate market.
